LanguageData.VME_BonfireOutcome.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will receive a recreation boost that last between 4 hours and 3 days that will raise their recreation bar. They'll also get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.\n\nThe ritual bonfire will stay lit for at least two quadrums, providing a beauty bonus nearby and counting towards the number of fires around for the Fire: Desired precept.
LanguageData.VME_BonfireOutcome.comps.0.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s social impact
LanguageData.VME_BonfireOutcome.comps.1.label: participant count
LanguageData.VME_BonfireOutcome.outcomeChances.0.desc: The {0} was terrible! Some pathetic little flames drifted around, and they went away too soon (no recreation effect applied).
LanguageData.VME_BonfireOutcome.outcomeChances.1.desc: The {0} was lackluster. We were expecting a wondrous conflagration, and instead we got an oversized campfire. At least it was kinda entertaining.\n\nRecreation of all participants will be raised for 4 hours.
LanguageData.VME_BonfireOutcome.outcomeChances.2.desc: The {0} was good. The flames rose and crackled majestically over the settlement, and it lifted all our spirits considerably.\n\nRecreation of all participants will be raised for 1 day.
LanguageData.VME_BonfireOutcome.outcomeChances.3.desc: The {0} was glorious! It was super fun and we really connected with each other with the shared experience.\n\nRecreation of all participants will be raised for 3 days.
LanguageData.VME_CeremonialSuicideRitualOutcome.descr: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days. All participants must be healthy to attend.
LanguageData.VME_CeremonialSuicideRitualOutcome.outco: The {0} was terrible! The blade was thrust laterally and there was blood and entrails everywhere. Disgusting!
The {0} was boring. The speech seemed forced. At the very least we have restored the honor of our colony.
The {0} has restored the honor of our colony. The shadow of defeat no longer clouds our minds.
The {0} was unforgettable! Everyone will remember the courage, self-control, and strong resolve. The honor of our colony is now spotless.
LanguageData.VME_DivineStarsRitualOutcome.description: Participants will get completely random results, with no regard for ritual quality.
LanguageData.VME_DivineStarsRitualOutcome.outcomeChan: Our destiny has been revealed by the stars.
Our destiny has been revealed by the stars.
LanguageData.VME_IncantationOutcome.description: If the incantation ritual goes well (positive outcome) it will increase the corruption need of all participants by 10%, as well as provide a mood bonus.
LanguageData.VME_IncantationOutcome.comps.0.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.VME_IncantationOutcome.comps.1.label: participant count
LanguageData.VME_IncantationOutcome.comps.2.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s social impact
The {0} was abnormal! An indescribably hideous gibbering! We'd even describe it as squamous, but we don't even know what that is! An unutterable word!
The {0} was suitably accursed. A litany of dark morbidities expressed in crime, perversion, and insanity.
The {0} was blasphemous. A promise of hidden and fathomless worlds of strange life which pulsate in the gulfs beyond the stars and press hideously upon our own globe in unholy dimensions which only the dead and the moonstruck can glimpse.
The {0} was loathsome! We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far.
LanguageData.VME_InsectoidHymnRitualOutcome.descripti: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.VME_InsectoidHymnRitualOutcome.outcomeCh: The {0} was incredibly uninteresting. Yeah, yeah, insects are cool. Bah.\n\nThe ritual had no effect over the insectoid herder's nest building ability.

The {0} was awkward. The speech was repetitive, and it did nothing to convince us of the divinity of our beloved insects.\n\nThe ritual had no effect over the insectoid herder's nest building ability.

The {0} was very rousing. The chanter showed impressing skill and the hymn appropriately extolled the virtues of our way of life.\n\nThe ritual refreshed the cooldown of the insectoid herder's nest building ability.

The {0} was entrancing! We can still hear the mesmerizing words of the hymn, like a myriad insectile legs crawling all over our bodies.

The ritual refreshed the cooldown of the insectoid herder's nest building ability.

The ritual also made any insectoids that were assaulting the colony flee.
LanguageData.VME_LeaderConversionOutcome.description: If it goes well, target's ideoligion certainty will be reduced or they will convert. If it goes badly, they will gain certainty in their old beliefs.
LanguageData.VME_LeaderConversionOutcome.outcomeChanc: The {0} was terrible! From the first word, it was a fruitless back-and-forth argument. It dragged on for a cringe-inducingly long time.
The {0} was ineffective. Most of the arguments were unclear, and the convertee countered those that made sense.
The {0} was effective. The speech not only delivered solid arguments and visibly swayed the convertee's thoughts, but kept the crowd entertained as well.
The {0} was masterful! Old beliefs seemed to dissolve effortlessly and inevitably, and our true knowledge was accepted.
LanguageData.VME_LeadershipChallengeRitualOutcome.des: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.VME_LeadershipChallengeRitualOutcome.ext: This is a duel to the death. Whoever wins will get (or keep) the leader title.
LanguageData.VME_LeadershipChallengeRitualOutcome.out: The leadership challenge was terrible! The fighters bumbled around, ineptly avoiding each other in a extended display of cowardice and weakness. Watching it just made people sad.
The leadership challenge was boring. The fighters wouldn't commit, so there were no exciting moments. At least our leader is the strongest.
The leadership challenge was good. The fighters went for blood and showed real heart. We now know that our leader is the strongest.
The leadership challenge was unforgettable! Both fighters gave all they had, and we know that our leader is now the strongest among us!
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.description: Every participant will get a "got some lovin'" memory, but the negative effects of a bad quality orgy will be much more severe than usual. Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.\nNote that all participants must be consenting adults. If the moral guide is not an adult the ritual will appear as blocked.
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.comps.0.label: orgy organizer present
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.comps.1.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.comps.2.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s social impact
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.comps.3.label: participant count
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.0.d: The {0} was grotesque! When you think of an orgy, you tend to imagine attractive people. This was... the entire opposite. The mental images will take a while to go away.
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.1.d: The {0} was awkward. Everyone sat around not knowing exactly what to do, naked bodies laying everywhere. Quite disappointing.
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.2.d: The {0} was very sexy. We gave ourselves to each other in a communal expression of our deepest passions.
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.3.d: The {0} was exhilarating! We all donned our high-society masquerade masks and uncovered our bodies. A barrage of ecstasy unlike no other made our bodies tremble with barely concealed excitement.
LanguageData.VME_PlagueFestivalRitualOutcome.descript: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days. If the ritual is boring or better, it will reward all participants with the Plague.
LanguageData.VME_PlagueFestivalRitualOutcome.outcomeC: The {0} was terrible! The speech was stuttering and incoherent, and the killing technique was botched. The corpse laid there, inert, and no holy miasma was liberated from it. What a waste of time!
The {0} was boring. The speech was repetitive and the killing technique was noticeably flawed. However the blessed plague is now among us.
The {0} was satisfying. The speech felt meaningful, and a holy miasma was liberated from the corpse, bathing us all in a sacred plague wind.
The {0} was spectacular! The speech brought everyone to the edge of a frenzy and a sacred plague wind wafted from the animal's corpse, blessing us.
LanguageData.VME_SlaveEmancipationOutcome.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.VME_SlaveEmancipationOutcome.outcomeChan: The {0} was horribly demagogic! We ended up looking as the evil guys here... With such a display, it's unlikely anyone will freely want to join the colony.

The {0} was a nice display of freethinking. Our leader's speech was clear and succint, explaining all the evils of slavery in a concise way. Participating slaves have a 25% chance of joining the colony.

The {0} was unshackling. Our leader's speech was very inspiring, detailing all the evils caused by slavery and the immense advantages of a free society. Participating slaves have a 50% chance of joining the colony.

The {0} was liberating! Our leader's speech was a masterclass in extolling the virtues of a free society, liberated for the shackles of slavery. Participating slaves have a 75% chance of joining the colony.

The {0} was amazing! Legends will be told about our leader's speech, and how those words will resonate in the future, elevating the cause of emancipation. Participating slaves have a 100% chance of joining the colony.
LanguageData.VME_TradingFairRitualOutcome.description: Depending on ritual quality and as long as it is positive, between 1 and 6 trade caravans arrive from friendly factions. Also, depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.\n\nYou will need to have at least 200 silver near a valid trading beacon for the fair to work properly, or else participants will receive a "cheap trading fair" mood penalty.
LanguageData.VME_TradingFairRitualOutcome.outcomeChan: The {0} was very poorly organized! With such a low quality effort, no additional caravans will be attracted to our settlement...

The {0} was unexciting. Some exciting transactions took place, but the majority of it was boring business talk. Luckily, it was interesting enough to attract a caravan to our settlement, which should arrive soon.
The {0} was very well organized. There was a lot of back and forth and networking. Luckily, at least three caravans will be attracted to our settlement, which should arrive soon.

The {0} was a wondrous event! We discussed exciting and innovative economical paradigms, and our settlement will be renowned as a center of finance learning. With such a display, at least six caravans will be attracted to our settlement, and they should arrive soon.
LanguageData.VME_ViolentConversionRitualOutcome.descr: Violent conversion has a 50% chance of either completely converting the participant to your ideoligion or just being executed. Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.VME_ViolentConversionRitualOutcome.outco: The {0} was awkward. The speech dragged on and it was a fruitless back-and-forth argument. The words were vague and unconvincing.
The {0} was satisfying. The speech was stirring and enjoyable to listen to.
The {0} was spectacular! Surely our beliefs will prevail over any others!
LanguageData.VME_WickerManBurningOutcome.description: A prisoner of the colony will be locked in a cage, and set fire, killing the prisoner in the process. Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.VME_WickerManBurningOutcome.outcomeChanc: The {0} was terrible! The prisoner rattled the cage all the time and it smelled like rotten bacon.
The {0} was lackluster. The prisoner just burned to death too fast, and the fire didn't even lift our spirits much.
The {0} was good. The anguished cries of the prisoner will resonate with us for a long time, another soul consumed by the flames.
The {0} was glorious! We will forever remember the thrashing of the prisoner, the frightened crescendo of screams as another soul was consumed by the holy flames.
